ingredients.ingredient: 2 Granny Smith apples, cut into cubes
1 large avocado - peeled, pitted, and cut into chunks
1 tablespoon honey, or more to taste
1 pinch ground cinnamon, or to taste

cookingTips: Add lemon juice immediately after cutting apples to prevent browning
Cut avocado just before serving to maintain color
Toss gently to avoid mashing avocado
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Apple and avocado make a nutritious pairing. What would you recommend for timing if making this ahead?
